ORIG.Column2: set job parameter (job#/Custname) in Ucam input window  (Job number in small letters)
Load genesis output (ORIG) data in UCAM
Check rotation for octagon pads (if any)
Arrange drill sizes in ascending order (keep original tool numbers)
Load - compare the CAD net - save the net compare log file
Save job in "ORIG" folder & copy original zip file.

REFERANCE.Column2: set job parameter (job#/Custname) in Ucam input window  (Job number in small letters)
Load genesis output (CLEAN) data in UCAM
Check rotation for octagon pads (if any)
Arrange drill sizes in ascending order
Do contourize and compare with ucam originals
ConvertNeg layer to +ve image (use reverse layer option)

Edit|stackup.Column2: set job parameter (job#/Custname) in Ucam input window  (Job number in small letters)
Load genesis output (Edit/Array) data in UCAM
Check array are in block. Blocks are not allowed in 1up data (Do not step and repeat extra layers)
Check rotation for octagon pads (if any)
Convert Draw to flash/contourize (if necessary / Mask layers features are should pad)
Split impedance tracks to a separate aperture & name it

Edit|Marking.Column2: Top silk | Bot silk | mask | Metal. Min scale 0.6
Do not use D250 code for non-white ident ----Use text aperture for date code width size 2.06x1.5mm
Verify the D250 date code [LAZY 8's] orientation on every job. Refer the customer supplied image if in bottom
Refer Master spec/DWG for logo type, format
Leave enough space to 14 digit number after datecode for build and meature/pickering job
Add "E96467" (only if master spec/drawing note calls for UL file number)
if master spec states to add  PO & PO is not known, Add "lazy8"
if master spec for CTI value then add "CTI=175"
Add zip file name in array border on top copper layer
Anything other than 0,90,180,270 deg not permitted
Additional marking (like PN/REV) as per FAB & Cust spec
Marking should not overlap with text on corresponding lyrs

EDIT|Rout.Column2: Split Tools as INT cutout (cw),INT Rout_Ext Rout (CCW), Then De-tabs
Should be arranged from Small to large
INT rout,tab rout & Ext rout (CCW),INT De-tabs,Ext de-tabs
INT rout(CW),Tab rout,Ext rout(CCWW),INT De-tabs,Ext de-tabs
Plunge point for cutout/closed loop: do not use the corners to plunge
Keep the rout PATH layer as such
Assign Rout Chain (rout path layer not needed)
Compensate Rout layerd & comppare with COMPO layer
Verify swarf hole location (with Compo_outline layer)

EDIT|Drill.Column2: split drills per FHS & split slot drills to separate tools
Arrange Tools from Small size to large
Set "npth for NPTH holes & "swarfs" for pilot holes
Run Drill optimize (only for First board drill & array holes)

DRILL_PLOT.Column2: Run Drill symbol (only for First board drill & array holes)
Add single board, Array drill to Brd edge, Technical band, board to board,Cutout, Chamfer,ARC & score indications
if NPTH drill to cu (like SMD,Trace <0.15mm not able to fix).Move to rout(rt02-01) - if NPTH partially falls on SMD also.
if NPTH have Greater size pad, 2nd drill to rout (rt01-01) and copy to compo layers
Change the minimum aperture size in plot drawing to 0.2mm. if the original drawing has tiny aperture then change it to 0.2mm while merging with pad plot
Additional drawing layer set as plot2

Netlist.Column2: Duplicate step, Expand Block & then Create netlist

Other.Column2: Copy NETLOG_CADNET Comparison report in Final edit data

Panel|Setup.Column2: ML to PTH if job is Double sided / SS
Enter cutomer name & job number in customer ID (use small letters)
Try to place the circuits in manafacturing panel such a way to get even frame around the circuits

Multipanel|Setup.Column2: Create Dummy lyrs_Match layer parameters for Diff boards
Provide Full mask clearance for No mask boards
if present along with PTH/ML boards, Do 2nd Drill for SS board
Enter customer name & Job number in customer ID (Use small letters)
For horizontal jump score dimention from top or bottom left- For vertical jump score dimention
from top left or top right
Add jump score for impedance coupons if applicable

Panel|Edit.Column2: Edit CUST ID text if it overlaps with panel thieving & panel feature
Remove broken drill for PTH board
Do Visual check & Verify panel features
Add Blind via coupons to manufaturing panel frame for all the blind via jobs[has only the circuit block+blind via coupons]
Move all CCD holes from main drill to rf01-01 layer [RF01-01 has the circuit block+CCD" set subclass "Blind"
Check DeTabs at panel formed cutout areas (If so increase the gap)
Add TEXT & Dimention for Score lines (add jump score indications if any)
Stretch shorting bars up to panel edge
Check the shorting bar connection by using same layers net option
confirm pilot hole does not falls on shorting bars
Run gold area calculation(exposed area by gold mask) for hard gold jobs & report in it Skyla FYI

Final.Column2: Include Customer related PDF | XLS files /polar report/impedance zip/coupon in to Final Zip
Include the impedance FYI points in Cam FYI report (if present)

Panel special.Check type: Check Master spec note and rout card PDF
Panel special.Sequential\/split\/stacked: Take notes given for panel features.
Check build in rout card pdf- follow the copper weight
Add blind via coupon as specified in master spec.
keep the layers as needed for inner part & Rename with new job number
Run panel as usual & note down the copper weight (reference only).
Replace all the layer files with main panel files
Add panel features (plating bar, score hole, bombsite,olec etc..). Take this one from old jobs.
modify Xray holes- check with old one.
Check master spec and add donut layer if needed.
